abstract: "Sure it's embarrassing...but embarrassment is hardly a reason for inviting permanent damage."
description: Studies the physiology aspects of venereal disease. Uses animation to show how the organisms of gonorrhea and syphilis enter and affect the body and how the diseases may be recognised. Stresses the need for treatment, pointing out that there is a cure for both diseases.
